title: # 322 - Kevin Weisman & ME
description:
It’s the premier of Season 2 of The Runaways on Hulu so we are releasing bonus podcasts with the stars of the show! Today I sit down with Kevin Weisman who plays Dale Yorkes on the show.
We talk about his extensive movie and tv career, how he started acting, what it's like being on set, The X-Files, working with Jennifer Gardner on Alias, auditions, drinking, lucky eyelashes, and much more!

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
